DK.PRJCTDESC:
Conway's Game of Life, er et cellul√¶r automat lavet af Britisk matematiker John Horton Conway.

Det er et spil uden spillere, hvori evolutionen af spillet er bestemt af spillepladens initiale tilstand.

EN.PRJCTDESC:
Conway's Game of Life, is a cellular automaton made by British mathematician John Horton Conway.

It's a zero player game in which the evolution of the game is determined by the initial state of the board.
